long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On several sports media sites, this extension replaces the corporate-sponsored names of stadiums, arenas, and bowl games with their original and better-known names. The list of sites the extension works on, as well as the names it affects, can be found at http://www.coinflipper.org/~jpnance/wrongs.php. The replacement list is far from complete so, if you see something missing or want this to work on a different site, please email namingwrongsfeedback@gmail.com or leave feedback here!
